titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices and Council, a proclamation. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Whereas we have received divers complaints from most part of the countrey, that several officers and soldiers of Their Majesties army ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Took printer to the King and Queen at thier Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at the Council-Chamber in Dublin, the 6th day of February, 1690.".
Date given according to Lady Day dating.
Steele notation: Arms 193. Complaints others 2) And Esta-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
